# The `add_lvalue_reference_if_not_pointer` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

If T is a pointer, just return it. If it is not, return T&amp;. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

struct llvm::add_lvalue_reference_if_not_pointer&lt;T, Enable&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

If T is a pointer, just return it. If it is not, return T&amp;.
